column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
column151: Hold: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts. The Phantom has the following special properties: • Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire. • Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. • When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.
column297: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!": After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom. A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.
column298: Waterborne Destiny: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.
column299: Prophecy of Submersion: When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s: • Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%. • Vaporize DMG increases by 15%. • Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%. • Frozen duration is extended by 15%.
column300: Lunar Chain: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
column301: Restless Revolution: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column302: Prophecy of Oblivion: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.
column303: Mockery of Fortuna: Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column304: Rhetorics of Calamitas: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement. A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.
